sources.name: Green Climate Fund Pledges- GCF
sources.description:
This dataset presents Green Climate Fund (GCF) pledges, normalised to USD equivalents per capita of the donor country to date.

Advanced economies have formally agreed to jointly mobilize USD 100 billion per year by 2020, from a variety of sources, to address the pressing mitigation and adaptation needs of developing countries.

Data sourced from the Green Climate Fund (GCF) datasets, available at: http://www.greenclimate.fund/partners/contributors/resources-mobilized
